text: Rudebox is the seventh studio album by English singer-songwriter Robbie Williams. It was released on 23 October 2006. ==Track listing== Notes * "Rudebox" contains elements of the composition "Boops (Here to Go)" as written by Bill Laswell, Carl Aiken, Bootsy Collins, Sly Dunbar and Robbie Shakespeare. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2006) Peak position Australian Albums (ARIA) 1 Austrian Albums (Ö3 Austria) 1 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Wallonia) 3 Danish Albums (Hitlisten) 1 Dutch Albums (Album Top 100) 2 Finnish Albums (Suomen virallinen lista) 1 French Albums (SNEP) 3 German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 1 Hungarian Albums (Mahasz) 3 Italian Albums (FIMI) 1 Mexican Albums (AMPROFON) 1 Polish Albums Chart 23 Portuguese Albums (AFP) 5 Spanish Albums (PROMUSICAE) 4 Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) 2 Swiss Albums (Schweizer Hitparade) 1 UK Albums (OCC) 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2006) Position Australian Albums (ARIA) 23 Austrian Albums (Ö3 Austria) 17 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) 42 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Wallonia) 50 Dutch Albums (Album Top 100) 25 French Albums (SNEP) 81 German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 22 Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) 62 Swiss Albums (Schweizer Hitparade) 18 UK Albums (OCC) 36 Chart (2007) Position Austrian Albums (Ö3 Austria) 65 Dutch Albums (Album Top 100) 83 German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 70 ==Certifications and sales== ==References== ==Other websites== * Official web page * Rudebox details in cosmopolis.ch Category:Robbie Williams albums Category:2006 albums
